column4: if i get a domain through godaddy, and pay them through paypal, after i pay and they have got the $$ can i remove godaddy from draft so the next year it comes time to pay it don't auto come out, i just manually pay them again?
fwiw, I recommend using gandi.net they play less games
they don't have .us domains there
k
know anymore thats good?
nah, I have just used gandi for several years and they are honest and no trouble, register.com screwed around with me hard, I finally got completely off of them
the godaddy issues I've heard about have to do with the features of their domain management GUI and I've heard their service is bad if you have questions or issues
nope
have you looked at this yet?  http://ddclient.sourceforge.net/#help
isn't this insecure for the domain for it to save a password in the config for a server
it use any encryption?
you should chown the file 600 for the user that runs the process
that way other users can't read it
if it's just for one machine to see, add it to /etc/hosts, otherwise you need BIND/named installed and that's a bit of work to figure out
syntax is    <IP address>   name.you.want.to.call.it
will this save?
yes it stays
you make the /etc/hosts entry on the machine you are connecting with, not the one you are connecting to, you are basically fooling your local machine to believe the name for the IP you setup there
you got cpanel on your site?
heh I've told you a few times in /msg, no...my hosting provider has it but I never installed it
sorry i havent got no messages from you
the channel may be doing some weird blocking or something
